titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1939 MASSUGER Mlle Francoise 6 Boulevard d'Italie Le Vesinot Seine et OIse
3 mos 1 V S 50 dep ref Apr 17 50
Jan 16 Bliss (?) Garden Party Jan 20 Jan 20 Good Earth Jan 25 Jan 25 Lamb in his Bosom Feb 1 27 Dusty Answer Feb 10 Feb 10 Good Earth Feb 13 Feb 13 Life of Byron (Nichol) Feb 20 20 Citadel Feb 27 27 My Antonia March 8 March 8 Invitation to the Waltz Mar 14 14 Those Barren Leaves Mar 23 22 Ethan Frome Apr 17
Renewed 3m. 1v. S. Nov 8 - to. Feb. 8 1940 50F Dep. 50.
Nov. 8 Bliss Nov. 10 10 De Profundis Nov. 13 13 American History. (Muzzey) Nov 30 30 Companion to Shakespeare Studies Dec 11 " New American History (Woodward) Jan 8 1940 Jun 8 Wuthering Heights Jan. 15 15 Journal of K. Mansfield Jan. 18 18 Inside Europe Feb 10 Renewed Feb 8th May 8th 1940 S 50 Feb 10 Inside Asia 0.50 a day Feb 24
Feb 24 Red Star over China March 9 March 9 Tobit Transplanted March 16 March 16 My Country & My People April 10 April 10 Listen to the Wind May 9 Renewed May 8th - August 8th (S) 50 1940 May 9 Reaching for the Stars a friend came Oct 23 - said Mlle Massuger was in country would renew - SB asked about book - he will see about it
